CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 22, 1961, pg. 1, reads: "Son, Proud Parents - Mr. and Mrs. W. T. Poole of 2840 Centre Ave., show the happiness that only parents experience and show when their son, by obedience and industry, justifies their love and sacrifice by distinctive achievement. Last Saturday, Atty. Cecil F. Poole, center, was names United Stated Attorney for the Northern District of California by President John F. Kennedy.  Attorney Poole visited with his parents briefly, en route home to San Francisco. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. Poole, Atty. Cecil F. Poole, and W. T. Poole, posed in front of fireplace and landscape painting, possibly in Poole home, 2840 Centre Avenue
